ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of Mako Rays mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1987895775
- Fixed the CE-patch to be loaded only if CE is loaded - Added Empire non-enemy patch
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/TheScellorRace][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] A very simple mod that adds a new race to the game. Credit to Jukashi for creating the Scellor. (also to my friends avery and kyle for helping me code and playtest thank u)
[h1]Features[/h1] Not a whole lot, I mostly made this because I just wanted to have them in my colony. -Somewhat broader comfy temperature range -More likely to be pretty, psychically sensitive, and gay (because bisexuality isn't a default trait) -Orel (head noodle) and tail body parts -A whole lot of rainbow hair -A custom faction which is pretty much identical to the civil outlander union human faction because I didn't feel like thinking about what to change -Some custom alien names of which only 90% were generated using https://www.fantasynamegenerators.com/alien-names.php -A patch for Combat Extended -No noses
[h2]Things that should be features but I probably won't ever get around to adding them[/h2] -Sub-races divided up into their 6 castes, seen here: https://www.furaffinity.net/view/9884959/ -Really anything to significantly distinguish them from standard humans other than being green
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
